verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Caught a glimpse of Your splendor in the corner of my eye,
The most beautiful thing I'd ever seen;
It was like a flash of lightning reflected off the sky,
And I know I'll never be the same.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Show me Your glory,
Send down Your presence, I wanna see Your face;
Show me Your glory,
Majesty shines about You and I can't go on without You, Lord.
